thread.title_full: Guidance: Access to Work: factsheet for customers

title: Guidance: Access to Work: factsheet for customers
text: Updated the fact sheet with information about the Access to Work cap from April 2017. 27 February 2017 Updated the 'How to claim' section of the factsheet. 7 June 2016 Updated the fact sheet with information about the Access to Work cap from April 2016. 23 December 2015 Published updated version of the factsheet with more detail about the rules for Access to Work and British Sign Language videos. 12 March 2015 Added 2 more conditions in factsheet under 'Do I qualify for this help?' - are about to start a Department for Education supported internship or BIS traineeship, or - are about to start self-arranged work experience under 7 May 2014 Factsheets updated to provide the latest information about Access to Work 1 October 2012
